about.title: Renk
about.description: art-rock band pushing the boundaries of music
about.extendedDescription:
Renk is an art-rock band that seeks to make sense of the world and to tell its story.


Through its music and lyrics, it carries the weight of being human in this world, showing both its fragility and its beauty.


At the end of the day, when one asks ‚ÄúIs this what life was meant to be?‚Äù, Renk aims to answer: ‚ÄúYes, this is what life was meant to be, and through it all, it was beautiful.‚Äù


Renk released its first single Sonsuz Karma≈üa in 2016. In 2020, the band shared its first concept album, Kƒ±yƒ±, with listeners. After performing in major cities across Turkey, Renk took its first international step with a concert in Gda≈Ñsk, Poland.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Latest developments and announcements from Renk

items.title: Our Acoustic Concert at K√ºlt Kavaklƒ±dere!
items.description: After a long period of work, our new album 'Renkler' has taken its place on all digital platforms. In this 10-track album, we have further developed our unique Renk sound by blending different music genres.

items.title: Istanbul Concert Received Great Interest
items.description: Our concert in Istanbul brought together thousands of music lovers. We had an unforgettable night and thank all participants.

items.title: Ankara and Izmir Concerts Announced
items.description: We will meet with our fans in Ankara and Izmir in September. Tickets will be on sale very soon, stay tuned!
